examination.findings_summary: Palpable firm, non-tender nodule in the right lobe of the thyroid.

plan: Order thyroid function tests (TSH) and ultrasound of the thyroid
referral to Endocrinology for Fine-Needle Aspiration (FNA).
encounter.history_of_present_illness: Found a small lump in the neck during self-exam. Asymptomatic.
